languages.text: "Хм, тут посторонние. Оставим добычу, пусть думает, что спасся... Чтобы наш последний визит раскрыл весь букет отчаяния".

traits.locale_text: "М-м, боль и отчаяние в одном флаконе... Будет ошибкой разбавлять столь дивный концентрат ложной надеждой. Дадим ему настояться".

languages.text: "Ah, someone else has joined us. Let us leave the prey here — make him believe he is out of danger... so that our final visit can reveal the full bouquet of his despair."
languages.original_text: "Хм, тут посторонние. Оставим добычу, пусть думает, что спасся... Чтобы наш последний визит раскрыл весь букет отчаяния".

traits.locale_text: "Ah, there are strangers here. Let us leave him the loot, he should think himself safe... So that our final visit reveals the bouquet of despair to its utmost."
"Ah, there are strangers here. Let us leave him the loot, he should think himself safe... So that our final visit reveals the bouquet of despair to its utmost."
"Ah, there are strangers here. Let's leave the loot here — make him believe he's out of danger... so that our final visit can reveal the full bouquet of his despair."
"Ah, there are strangers here. Let's leave the loot here — make him believe he's out of danger... so that our final visit can reveal the full bouquet of his despair."
"Ah, someone else has joined us. Let us leave the prey here — make him believe he is out of danger... so that our final visit can reveal the full bouquet of his despair."
"Ah, someone else has joined us. Let us leave the prey here — make him believe he is out of danger... so that our final visit can reveal the full bouquet of his despair."

languages.text: "Ah, noch jemand hat sich uns angeschlossen. Lassen wir die Beute hier – er soll glauben, dass er außer Gefahr ist ... dann kann unser letzter Besuch das ganze Ausmaß seiner Verzweiflung offenbaren."
languages.original_text: "Ah, someone else has joined us. Let us leave the prey here — make him believe he is out of danger... so that our final visit can reveal the full bouquet of his despair."

traits.locale_text: "Ah, noch jemand hat sich uns angeschlossen. Lassen wir die Beute hier – er soll glauben, dass er außer Gefahr ist ... dann kann unser letzter Besuch das ganze Ausmaß seiner Verzweiflung offenbaren."

languages.text: « Ah, quelqu'un d'autre se joint à nous. Laissons la proie ici, pour lui faire croire que le danger est passé... Ainsi, notre ultime visite révélera toute la saveur de son désespoir. »
languages.original_text: "Ah, someone else has joined us. Let us leave the prey here — make him believe he is out of danger... so that our final visit can reveal the full bouquet of his despair."

traits.locale_text: « Ah, quelqu'un d'autre se joint à nous. Laissons la proie ici, pour lui faire croire que le danger est passé... Ainsi, notre ultime visite révélera toute la saveur de son désespoir. »

languages.text: “啊，有别人来了。我们暂时离开那个猎物吧，让他自以为已经逃离危险了……这样一来，等我们最后一次造访他的时候，就能享受到最为甘美的绝望。”
languages.original_text: "Ah, someone else has joined us. Let us leave the prey here — make him believe he is out of danger... so that our final visit can reveal the full bouquet of his despair."

traits.locale_text: “啊，有别人来了。我们暂时离开那个猎物吧，让他自以为已经逃离危险了……这样一来，等我们最后一次造访他的时候，就能享受到最为甘美的绝望。”

languages.text: «Ah, alguien más se une a nosotros. Dejemos aquí a nuestra presa, que crea que el peligro ha pasado... Así, nuestra última visita revelará el buqué de su desesperación en todo su esplendor».
languages.original_text: "Ah, someone else has joined us. Let us leave the prey here — make him believe he is out of danger... so that our final visit can reveal the full bouquet of his despair."

traits.locale_text: «Ah, alguien más se une a nosotros. Dejemos aquí a nuestra presa, que crea que el peligro ha pasado... Así, nuestra última visita revelará el buqué de su desesperación en todo su esplendor».

languages.text: 「ああ、侵入者がいるな。獲物はここに置いておこう、奴に危険が去ったと思わせてやるんだ…そして最後に俺たちが現れて、奴に余すところなく絶望を味わわせるんだ」
languages.original_text: "Ah, someone else has joined us. Let us leave the prey here — make him believe he is out of danger... so that our final visit can reveal the full bouquet of his despair."

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、侵入者がいるな。獲物はここに置いておこう、奴に危険が去ったと思わせてやるんだ…そして最後に俺たちが現れて、奴に余すところなく絶望を味わわせるんだ」

languages.text: "Aha, biri daha bize katıldı. Avı burada bırakalım, tehlikeyi atlattığına inansın... İnansın ki asıl ziyaretimizi gerçekleştirdiğimizde çaresizliğinin tüm renkleri ortaya çıksın."
languages.original_text: "Ah, someone else has joined us. Let us leave the prey here — make him believe he is out of danger... so that our final visit can reveal the full bouquet of his despair."

traits.locale_text: "Aha, biri daha bize katıldı. Avı burada bırakalım, tehlikeyi atlattığına inansın... İnansın ki asıl ziyaretimizi gerçekleştirdiğimizde çaresizliğinin tüm renkleri ortaya çıksın."
